field.name: SRAMSIZE
field.description: Returns the size of the system RAM

field.name: OSC32KSEL
field.description: 32 kHz Oscillator

field.name: LPTMR1SEL
field.description: LP timer Channe 1 Select\n This field is used to select source for LP timer channel 1

field.name: LPTMR2SEL
field.description: LP timer Channel 2 Select\n This field is used to select source for LP timer channel 2

field.name: LPTMR3SEL
field.description: LP timer Channel 3 Select\n This field is used to select source for LP timer channel 3

field.name: CMPOLPTMR0SEL
field.description: Comparator output selection for LPTMR channel 0\n This field is used to select CMP outputs as the source for LP timer channel 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: CMP[1] output selected as LPTMR input[0]

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: CMP[0] output selected as LPTMR input[0]

field.name: RAMSBDIS
field.description: Disable source bias of System SRAM arrays during VLPR or VLPW

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Source bias of System SRAM enabled during VLPR or VLPW

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Source bias of System SRAM disabled during VLPR or VLPW

field.name: RAMBPEN
field.description: RAM Bitline Precharge Enable\n Enable System SRAM bitline precharge during VLPR or VLPW

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Bitline precharge of system SRAM disabled during VLPR or VLPW

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Bitline precharge of system SRAM enabled during VLPR or VLPW

field.name: NMIDIS
field.description: NMI Disable\n This field is used as an alternate to FTFL_FOPT[2] to disable the NMI temporarily. It is also advised to program this bit while changing the state of the NMI pin from NMI to GPIO functionality

field.name: PLL_VLP_EN
field.description: PLL VLP Enable\n When set, this bit enables the PLL in VLP modes

field.name: PTC2_HD_EN
field.description: PTC2 HighDrive Enable\n Enables the High Drive on pad PTC[2] when set

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: High Drive on pad PTC[2] disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: High Drive on pad PTC[2] enabled

field.name: SAR_TRG_CLK_SEL
field.description: SAR ADC Trigger Clk Select\n Selects the clock used to generate the ADC triggers

field.name: CLKOUTSEL
field.description: Clock Out Select\n This field can be used to select one of the following clocks for CLKOUT pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b101
enumeratedValue.description: Muxed 32Khz source (please refer SOPT1[19:18] for possible options)

field.name: PINID
field.description: Pincount Identification

field.name: DIEID
field.description: Die ID\n Marks the change in Base Layer

field.name: REVID
field.description: Revision ID

field.name: SRAMSIZE
field.description: SRAM Size

field.name: ATTR
field.description: System SRAM Size

field.name: SERIESID
field.description: Kinetis Series ID

field.name: SUBFAMID
field.description: Kinetis Sub-Family ID

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0010
enumeratedValue.description: MKMx2 Subfamily (Device derivatives with 2 AFE enabled)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0011
enumeratedValue.description: MKMx3 Subfamily (Device derivatives with 3 AFE enabled)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0100
enumeratedValue.description: MKMx4 Subfamily (Device derivatives with 4 AFE enabled)

field.name: FAMID
field.description: Kinetis family ID

field.name: EWM
field.description: External Watchdog Monitor Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the EWM module

field.name: MCG
field.description: MCG Clock Gate Control.\n This bit controls the clock gate to the MCG Module

field.name: OSC
field.description: Oscillator (Mhz) Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the Oscillator(Mhz)

field.name: I2C0
field.description: I2C0 Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the I2C0 module

field.name: I2C1
field.description: I2C1 Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the I2C1 module

field.name: UART0
field.description: UART0 Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the UART0 module

field.name: UART1
field.description: UART1 Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the UART1 module

field.name: UART2
field.description: UART 2 Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the UART2 module

field.name: UART3
field.description: UART 3 Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the UART3 module

field.name: VREF
field.description: VREF Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the VREF module

field.name: CMP0
field.description: High Speed Comparator 0 Clock Gate Control.\n This bit controls the clock gate to the CMP0 module

field.name: CMP1
field.description: High Speed Comparator 1 Clock Gate Control.\n This bit controls the clock gate to the CMP1 module

field.name: SPI0
field.description: SPI0 Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the SPI0 module

field.name: SPI1
field.description: SPI1 Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the SPI1 module

field.name: SLCD
field.description: Segmented LCD Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the SGLCD Module

field.name: PORTA
field.description: Port A Clock Gate Control

field.name: PORTB
field.description: Port B Clock Gate Control

field.name: PORTC
field.description: Port C Clock Gate Control

field.name: PORTD
field.description: Port D Clock Gate Control

field.name: PORTE
field.description: Port E Clock Gate Control

field.name: PORTF
field.description: Port F Clock Gate Control

field.name: PORTG
field.description: Port G Clock Gate Control

field.name: PORTH
field.description: Port H Clock Gate Control

field.name: PORTI
field.description: Port I Clock Gate Control

field.name: IRTC
field.description: IRTC Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the IRTC Module

field.name: IRTCREGFILE
field.description: IRTC_REG_FILE Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the IRTC_REG_FILE

field.name: WDOG
field.description: Watchdog Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the WatchDog Module

field.name: XBAR
field.description: Peripheral Crossbar Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the XBAR Module

field.name: TMR0
field.description: Quadtimer0 Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the QTMR0

field.name: TMR1
field.description: Quadtimer1 Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the QTMR1

field.name: TMR2
field.description: Quadtimer2 Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the QTMR2

field.name: TMR3
field.description: Quadtimer3 Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the QTMR3

field.name: FTFA
field.description: FTFA Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the FTFA Module

field.name: DMAMUX0
field.description: DMA Mux 0 Clock Gate Control

field.name: DMAMUX1
field.description: DMA Mux 1 Clock Gate Control

field.name: DMAMUX2
field.description: DMA Mux 2 Clock Gate Control

field.name: DMAMUX3
field.description: DMA Mux 3 Clock Gate Control

field.name: RNGA
field.description: RNGA Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the RNGA Module

field.name: ADC
field.description: SAR ADC Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the SAR ADC Module

field.name: PIT0
field.description: PIT0 Clock Gate Control

field.name: PIT1
field.description: PIT1 Clock Gate Control

field.name: AFE
field.description: AFE Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock to all four AFE channels

field.name: CRC
field.description: Programmable CRC Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the PCRC Module

field.name: LPTMR0
field.description: LPTMR Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the LPTMR Module

field.name: SIM_LP
field.description: SIM_LP Clock Gate Control\n This bit controls the clock gate to the SIM Low Power logic

field.name: SIM_HP
field.description: SIM_HP Clock Gate Control This bit controls the clock gate to the SIM High Power Logic

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Clock is always enabled to SIM

field.name: MPU
field.description: MPU Clock Gate Control

field.name: DMA0
field.description: DMA Clock Gate Control

field.name: SYSCLKMODE
field.description: System Clock Mode\n This field is used to select the System clock : Bus clock : Flash clock ratio

field.name: SYSDIV
field.description: System Clock divider\n This field can be used to program Core/Platform divider

field.name: FLASHDIS
field.description: Flash Disable

field.name: FLASHDOZE
field.description: Flash Doze

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Flash remains enabled during Wait mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Flash is disabled for the duration of Wait mode

field.name: PFSIZE
field.description: Program Flash Size

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0000
enumeratedValue.description: 8 KB of program flash memory, 0.25 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0001
enumeratedValue.description: 16 KB of program flash memory, 0.5 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0011
enumeratedValue.description: 32 KB of program flash memory, 1 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0101
enumeratedValue.description: 64 KB of program flash memory, 2 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0111
enumeratedValue.description: 128 KB of program flash memory, 4 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1001
enumeratedValue.description: 256 KB of program flash memory, 8 KB protection region

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1111
enumeratedValue.description: 128 KB of program flash memory, 4 KB protection region

field.name: MAXADDR
field.description: Max address block

field.name: UID
field.description: Unique Identification

field.name: XBARAFEMODOUTSEL
field.description: XBAR AFE Modulator Output Select\n This field selects modulator data output of the respective AFE channel to drive XBAR_IN[3]

field.name: DMADONESEL
field.description: DMA Done select\n This field can be used to select the DMA Done flag to drive XBAR_IN[32]

field.name: AFECLKSEL
field.description: AFE Clock Source Select\n Selects between PLL, FLL and OSC clock as the source for the PLL clock branch for AFE Clock Mux

field.name: AFECLKPADDIR
field.description: AFE Clock Pad Direction Controls the direction of the AFE CLK pin

field.name: UARTMODTYPE
field.description: UART Modulation Type\n Selects between TypeA and TypeB modulation for IRDA support

field.name: UART0IRSEL
field.description: UART0 IRDA Select\n Exclusive selection with other UARTs. Do not select while another UART is selected for the same functionality

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pad RX input (PTD[0] or PTF[3], as selected in Pinmux control) selected for RX input of UART0 and UART0 TX signal is not used for modulation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: UART0 selected for IRDA modulation. UART0 TX modulated by XBAR_OUT[14] and UART0 RX input connected to XBAR_OUT[13]

field.name: UART1IRSEL
field.description: UART1 IRDA Select\n Exclusive selection with other UARTs. Do not select while another UART is selected for the same functionality

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pad RX input (PTD[2] or PTI[0], as selected in Pinmux control) selected for RX input of UART1 and UART1 TX signal is not used for modulation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: UART1 selected for IRDA modulation. UART1 TX modulated by XBAR_OUT[14] and UART1 RX input connected to XBAR_OUT[13]

field.name: UART2IRSEL
field.description: UART2 IRDA Select\n Exclusive selection with other UARTs. Do not select while another UART is selected for the same functionality

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pad RX input PTE[6] selected for RX input of UART2 and UART2 TX signal is not used for modulation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: UART2 selected for IRDA modulation. UART2 TX modulated by XBAR_OUT[14] and UART2 RX input connected to XBAR_OUT[13]

field.name: UART3IRSEL
field.description: UART3 IRDA Select\n Exclusive selection with other UARTs. Do not select while another UART is selected for the same functionality

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pad RX input (PTC[3] or PTD[7], as selected in Pinmux control) selected for RX input of UART3 and UART3 TX signal is not used for modulation

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: UART3 selected for IRDA modulation. UART3 TX modulated by XBAR_OUT[14] and UART3 RX input connected to XBAR_OUT[13]

field.name: XBARPITOUTSEL
field.description: XBAR PIT Output select This field selects PIT timer and timer channel to drive XBAR_IN[16]

field.name: EWMINSEL
field.description: External Watchdog Monitor Input Select\n This field is used to select input for external watchdog monitor

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Input from PAD (PTE[2] or PTE[4] as selected from Pinmux control )

field.name: TMR0PLLCLKSEL
field.description: Timer CH0 PLL clock select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Selects Bus Clock as source for the Timer CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Selects the PLL_AFE clock as the source for Timer CH0. The PLL_AFE clock source is itself selected using the MISC_CTL[5:4]

field.name: TMR0SCSSEL
field.description: Quadtimer Channel0 Secondary Count Source Select\n This field is used to select secondary count input source for Quadtimer Channel0. Configure TMR_0_CTRL_SCS = 00b to route selected secondary source to the timer Channel0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pad PTF1 or PTD5, depending upon PCTL configuration

field.name: TMR1SCSSEL
field.description: Quadtimer Channel1 Secondary Count Source Select\n This field is used to select secondary count input source for Quadtimer Channel1. Configure TMR_1_CTRL_SCS = 01b to route selected secondary source to the timer Channel1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pad PTG0 or PTC6, depending upon PCTL configuration

field.name: TMR2SCSSEL
field.description: Quadtimer Channel2 Secondary Count Source Select\n This field is used to select secondary count input source for Quadtimer Channel2. Configure TMR_2_CTRL_SCS = 10b to route selected secondary source to the timer Channel2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pad PTF7 or PTF0, depending upon PCTL configuration

field.name: TMR3SCSSEL
field.description: Quadtimer Channel3 Secondary Count Source Select\n This field is used to select secondary count input source for Quadtimer Channel3. Configure TMR_3_CTRL_SCS = 11b to route selected secondary source to the timer Channel3

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pad PTE5 or PTD1, depending upon PCTL configuration

field.name: TMR0PCSSEL
field.description: Quadtimer Channel0 Primary Count Source Select\n This is used to select primary count source (clock) for Quadtimer Channel0. Configure TMR_0_CTRL_PCS = 1xxxb to route selected primary clock source to the timer Channel0

field.name: TMR1PCSSEL
field.description: Quadtimer Channel1 Primary Count Source Select\n This is used to select primary count source (clock) for Quadtimer Channel1. Configure TMR_1_CTRL_PCS = 1xxxb to route selected primary clock source to the timer Channel1

field.name: TMR2PCSSEL
field.description: Quadtimer Channel2 Primary Count Source Select\n This is used to select primary count source (clock) for Quadtimer Channel2. Configure TMR_2_CTRL_PCS = 1xxxb to route selected primary clock source to the timer Channel2

field.name: TMR3PCSSEL
field.description: Quadtimer Channel3 Primary Count Source Select\n This is used to select primary count source (clock) for Quadtimer Channel3. Configure TMR_3_CTRL_PCS = 1xxxb to route selected primary clock source to the timer Channel3

field.name: RTCCLKSEL
field.description: RTC Clock select\n Selects between 32K IRC and OSC_32K clk for RTC operation

field.name: VREFBUFOUTEN
field.description: VrefBuffer Output Enable\n Operates switch in VrefBuffer to enable the internal 1.2v reference to be driven to VREF pad

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Buffer drives selected voltage (selected by vref_buffer_sel) on pad

field.name: VREFBUFINSEL
field.description: VrefBuffer Input Select\n Selects Between Internal 1.2v reference and external reference for SAR and DAC

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Internal Reference selected as Buffer Input

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: External Reference selected as Buffer Input

field.name: VREFBUFPD
field.description: VrefBuffer Power Down\n Powers down VrefBuffer when set
